channel.title: Unix VPS RunServer Error
channel.description:
[code]t root@dls:~/richscape# java -Xmx800M server Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server root@dls:~/richscape# [/code]
Any ideas on how to fix the error? This is on a VPS/SHH Shell Account btw...

item.title: Unix VPS RunServer Error
item.dc:creator: @EwfsPrince EwfsPrince
item.description:
@EwfsPrince wrote:

[quote=“Hidendra, post:4, topic:233601”]ls *.class
Is server.class in that?[/quote]
Yes.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 27 September 2008, 23:51:55[/size][hr]

chmod: cannot access `server.class’: No such file or directory

But the file is there… >_____<[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 28 September 2008, 00:09:52[/size][hr]Now I get this error:
root@dls:~/richscape/RichScape# java -Xmx800M server Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Bad version number in .class file at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:620) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:124) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(URLClassLoader.java:260) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(URLClassLoader.java:56) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:195) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:268) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:251) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:319) root@dls:~/richscape/RichScape#
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 28 September 2008, 05:37:09[/size][hr]Any suggestions on what the problem could be?

Read full topic
